characteristics.Dry: Feels tight, rough, flaky; lacks oil.
characteristics.Oily: Shiny, greasy, prone to acne and large pores.
characteristics.Combination: Oily T-zone (forehead, nose, chin) with dry cheeks.
characteristics.Normal: Balanced, smooth, not too dry or oily.
characteristics.Sensitive: Easily irritated, redness, reacts to products.

recommendations.Dry: Use hydrating cleansers, rich moisturizers, and avoid alcohol-based products.
recommendations.Oily: Use oil-free moisturizers, clay masks, and avoid heavy creams.
recommendations.Combination: Use lightweight moisturizers, balance oily and dry areas separately.
recommendations.Normal: Maintain a simple skincare routine with gentle products.
recommendations.Sensitive: Use fragrance-free, hypoallergenic products and avoid harsh chemicals.
